body:
Hi guys,



I'm trying to make a comfort analysis using Honeybee's comfort tools. One of the required inputs are srfIndoorTemp, which should come from the EP result. But the EP srf results have an uniform temperature distribution e.g. the whole floor is 18C. 

My question is; do you have any suggestions on how to make a more accurate surface temperature distribution? 

My thought was to use a radiation analysis and then somehow relate that to the EP result.



Cheers

replies.body:
You should look at these discussions [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/initial-documentation-of-thermal-maps) and [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/problem-displaying-annual-indoor-comfort-metrics?groupUrl=ladybug&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987&id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1225443&page=2#comments).

-A.
